flawed_nl_solution:
After doubling he was able to hold 80*2=<<80*2=160>>160 kg per hand
Specialization gave him another 160*0.1=<<160*0.1=61>>61 kg
So he lifted 160+61=<<160+61=221>>221 kg per hand
That means he lifted a total of 442 kg
#### 442

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 61. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
